statements: SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, interaction_date FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, notes FROM ClientInteractions WHERE communication_method = 'Phone Call';
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT client_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM ClientInteractions GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_id ASC
SELECT interaction_type, communication_method FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, notes FROM ClientInteractions WHERE notes LIKE '%important%'
SELECT DISTINCT client_id, communication_method FROM ClientInteractions ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, communication_method FROM ClientInteractions
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, email, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date;
SELECT client_id, interaction_date, notes FROM interactions WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT SUM(client_id) AS total_clients FROM clients;
SELECT clients.first_name, interactions.interaction_date, interactions.interaction_type FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM ClientInformation WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM ClientCommunications WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM ClientInformation WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM ClientInteractions GROUP BY client_id HAVING interaction_count > 3;
SELECT c.full_name, cc.communication_date FROM ClientInformation c JOIN ClientCommunications cc ON c.client_id = cc.client_id WHERE cc.communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT advisor_name, specialization FROM Advisors ORDER BY advisor_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM Interactions WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM Interactions WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_email, specialization FROM Advisors WHERE specialization = 'Finance' OR specialization = 'Marketing';
SELECT c.client_name, c.email, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM Clients c LEFT JOIN Interactions i ON c.client_id = i.client_id WHERE i.interaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_specialty FROM advisors
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM interactions
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_specialty FROM advisors ORDER BY advisor_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, advisor_name, meeting_date FROM clients c JOIN meetings m ON c.client_id = m.client_id JOIN advisors a ON a.advisor_id = m.advisor_id WHERE c.client_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
